channel.title: CrossingBorder – Vamos a Bailar
channel.description: A traveling blog for discovering South America

item.title: Welcome to Colombia and the Santuario de Las Lajas
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
Welcome to Colombia Goodbye Ecuador We left Otavalo early in the morning. The plan of the day was busy: bus, taxi, migration office and church. We took the first bus from Otavalo to the closest Ecuadorian city to the border Tulcan. After 4 hours, we needed a taxi to reach the immigration office. After getting […]

The post Welcome to Colombia and the Santuario de Las Lajas appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: Marble Caves: Exploring Puerto Rio Tranquilo’s treasure
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
After a few days on the Argentinian side of Patagonia, I finally discover the Chilean Side. More green, rainier… We can’t get everything we want! Let’s discover the first marvel called Marble Caves on the Carretera Austral. A long way to enter in Chile The journey from El Chaltén to Puerto Rio Tranquilo is long, […]

The post Marble Caves: Exploring Puerto Rio Tranquilo’s treasure appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: El Calafate and the Perito Moreno monster
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
After spending few days in Ushuaia, I continue my journey to the north and stop in El Calafate. I stop here for the main attraction the glacier Perito Moreno. A huge glacier that is moving very fast. A long journey of bus I leave Ushuaia around 5 am in the morning, quite early… no, too […]

The post El Calafate and the Perito Moreno monster appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.

item.title: A journey to Uruguay
item.dc:creator: eric
item.description:
While spending one month in Buenos Aires, I started to feel oppress by the big city. Thus I was looking for an escape to get nature and peace. I tried two journeys. One to Tigre a classical destination of Porteños (the nickname given to inhabitants of Buenos Aires) and a second to another country Uruguay. […]

The post A journey to Uruguay appeared first on Vamos a Bailar.
